lessons.title: Course Overview
lessons.content: This lesson introduces the course structure, learning outcomes, and tools required.

lessons.title: Introduction to Linux
lessons.content: Basic Linux commands and how to use the terminal effectively.

lessons.title: Python Basics
lessons.content: Variables, data types, conditionals, loops, and functions in Python.

lessons.title: Working with Libraries
lessons.content: Introduction to NumPy and Pandas for data manipulation.
